Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Alexandra Lodge in Bundaberg, you'll be near the airport and minutes from Bundaberg Tourist Information Centre and Buss Park. This bed & breakfast is within close proximity of Bundaberg Regional Art Gallery and Bundaberg and District Historical Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 7 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and barbecue grills.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.
